subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mike Holmgren and the Packers won Super Bowl XXI in 1997. Holmgren’s final home game as Seahawks coach is Sunday against the Jets and Brett Favre, one of his protégés.
snippet: Mike Holmgren and the Packers won Super Bowl XXI in 1997. Holmgren’s final home game as Seahawks coach is Sunday against the Jets and Brett Favre, one of his protégés.
